Based on the preferences you've shared, I would recommend the movie "Eve's Bayou" (1997).

The plot of this movie revolves around a young woman named Eve who witnesses a shocking event in her family's gothic world. The event leaves Eve with a deep sense of unease and a nagging suspicion that something sinister is lurking within her family's dark and eerie world.

As the plot unfolds, we witness Eve engaging in a series of intriguing encounters with various fascinating characters who inhabit her family's dark and eerie world.

One of the most intriguing aspects of this movie revolves around Eve's encounter with her father, who is revealed to be a deeply troubled and manipulative man who has been using his position of power within his family to maintain a facade of normalcy while continuing to engage in a series of highly unethical and disturbing behaviors that have resulted in the degradation and destruction of not only his own moral character and integrity but also the moral character and integrity of the entire family system that he has been so desperately trying to maintain.
